mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (board_idx, post_title, post_content, member_idx) VALUES (#{boardIdx},#{postTitle}, #{postContent},#{memberIdx});
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_idx, p.post_title, p.post_content, pi.post_image_path, pi.post_t_image_path FROM posts p JOIN post_images pi ON p.post_idx = pi.post_idx WHERE p.post_idx = #{postIdx}
